original_text: The priest is to order the house to be emptied before he goes in to examine the mold, so that nothing in the house will be pronounced unclean. After this the priest is to go in and inspect the house.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 색점을 살펴보러 가기 전에 그 집안에 있는 모든 것이 부정을 면하게 하기 위하여 그 집을 비우도록 명령한 후에 들어가서 그 집을 볼지니

sentences.original_text: The priest is to order the house to be emptied
before he goes in to examine the mold
so that nothing in the house will be pronounced unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 집 안의 아무것도 부정하다고 선언되지 않게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: After this the priest is to go in
